column1: echo ¦pecl¦install xdebug && docker-php-ext-enable xdebug && echo "xdebug.var_display_max_depth = 5" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini && echo "xdebug.max_nesting_level = 500" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦apt-get¦update && apt-get install -y locales && echo "en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen && echo "fr_FR.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen && echo "sv_SE.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen && locale-gen && /usr/sbin/update-locale LANG=en_US.U... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦"log_errors = On" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini && echo "error_reporting = E_ALL" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini && echo "error_log = /dev/stderr" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini :: Filesystem_operation
